overview:
Pierre has significant experience in Venture Capital and has been active in new venture creation across Asia since 2003. He is currently the Managing Partner of Extream Ventures (www.extreamventures.com), an early-stage venture fund based in Singapore, funded in part by the Singapore National Research Foundation. In addition to his role at Extream Ventures, he is a Partner of Upstream Ventures (www.upstreamventures.com), a Singapore-based seed & start-up investment firm launched in 2003.

He is a member of the Singapore Institute of Directors and currently serves on the boards of several investment portfolio companies.
